title: The Cruise Series 1 4of6 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVGroup.org
description:
The Cruise: Series 1

Travel Documentary hosted by Hugh Bonneville, published by ITV in 2016 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/8/8e/The-Cruise-Series-1-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

The Cruise: Series 1
Life on board with the 1,400 crew who live and work for up to nine months a year on luxury cruise ship the Regal Princess.


4)  Part 4 
The staff compete to win the coveted title of employee of the month, which carries a top prize of $500, as well as deck privileges, tours and extra time off. Deck hand Rhymond is among those with their eye on the top prize, having braved the elements since 5am to keep the ship looking pristine. Meanwhile, Timothy feels sad about leaving his friends on the front desk to start his new job with the shore excursions team, and engineer Scott is left in charge when his boss goes on leave, with jobs including making drinking water from the sea.

5)  Part 5 
Captain Perrin throws a huge party to celebrate the ship's first birthday, with executive chef Shaun creating a giant cake that is so heavy it takes 10 men to carry - and they soon come unstuck when they cannot fit the ship-shaped sponge into the lift. Passengers Norman and Maria are looking forward to attending the lavish formal party, although they will be going nowhere unless front-desk supervisor Herbert can locate their missing luggage, which contains his tuxedo and her party frock. Dancer Dulcie faces her staff appraisal, and a visit from her boyfriend helps with her homesickness.

6)  Part 6 
Captain Perrin throws a huge party to celebrate the ship's first birthday, with executive chef Shaun creating a giant cake that is so heavy it takes 10 men to carry - and they soon come unstuck when they cannot fit the ship-shaped sponge into the lift. Passengers Norman and Maria are looking forward to attending the lavish formal party, although they will be going nowhere unless front-desk supervisor Herbert can locate their missing luggage, which contains his tuxedo and her party frock. Dancer Dulcie faces her staff appraisal, and a visit from her boyfriend helps with her homesickness.
